General.Name: Singtex Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Singtex Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells textiles using eco-friendly materials in Taiwan. It offers yarn, fabric, and garment. The company was founded in 1989 is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 10, Wuquan 2nd Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 24892
